original_article.title: How to use cryptocurrency to buy a home in Dubai (legally and safely)
original_article.summary: Bradley Peak 1 hour ago How to use cryptocurrency to buy a home in Dubai (legally and safely) Dubai now enables crypto property deals under clear VARA rules, with major developers like Damac and Emaar accepting BTC, ETH and stablecoins. Listen 0:00 10607 How to COINTELEGRAPH IN YOUR SOCIAL FEEDKey takeawaysDubai now has clear laws for buying property with crypto via VARA and the UAE Central Bank. Major developers like Damac and Emaar accept BTC, ETH and stablecoins for property sales.
